name: U.S. Dollar Falls as Funding Need Ease
description: The U.S. dollar slipped Tuesday to open a holiday-shortened week.

name: U.S. Dollar Weakens Versus Canadian Currency
description: The dollar inched higher Friday, as investors reacted to renewed political unrest in Europe.

name: Dollar Higher on Renewed Political Unrest in Europe
description: The White House has said the tax overhaul will stimulate the economy and lift inflation; stronger growth could lead the Federal Reserve to raise rates at a faster clip, increasing the dollar’s appeal to yield-seeking investors.

name: Dollar Edged Lower As Investors Analyze Details of Tax Overhaul
description: The White House has said the tax overhaul will stimulate the economy and lift inflation; stronger growth could lead the Federal Reserve to raise rates at a faster clip, increasing the dollar’s appeal to yield-seeking investors.

name: U.S. Dollar Weakens Versus Canadian Currency
description: The dollar inched higher Friday, as investors reacted to renewed political unrest in Europe.

name: Dollar Higher on Renewed Political Unrest in Europe
description: The U.S. dollar edged lower Tuesday with investors assessing the direction of the currency as the Republican tax cut package moved closer to becoming law.
